The central concept of the theory is based on the idea of the face, understood in terms of sociology. â€œFaceâ€ is something that can be lost, maintained, or enhanced. item.title: Watching good & bad movies ğŸ­
item.description: My Spring break got extended, all classes are going to transcend into the cloud for the foreseeable future, and I have a lot of time to spare on my hands. item.description: "Electronic mail (email or e-mail) is a method of exchanging messages ("mail") between people using electronic devices.
